past_events.event: Discover the World with RISD OISS
past_events.details: To celebrate the diverse, international student body of RISD, Gendo Taiko performed at the Discover the World event hosted by the Office of International Student Services.
Invited by the Japanese Cultural Club at Tufts University, Gendo Taiko performed at their annual Matsuri.
We played a short show alongside the talented students of The Wheeler School celebrating their cultural heritage through the arts.
Gendo Taiko continued a longstanding tradition of performing at the popular Providence attraction Waterfire.
